Package fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.board

Class RectangleBoard

java.lang.Object
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.board.AbstractBoard
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.board.RectangleBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class RectangleBoard
extends AbstractBoard
Represent a rectangle game board, one of the different shapes for the game. It extends Abstract Board to follow the board's construction.

    • isVertical

      Return if the board is horizontal or not

    • isCloseEnoughToFarthestCoordinate

      private boolean isCloseEnoughToFarthestCoordinate​(int coordinateField, int distanceMax, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> coordinatesField)
      Parameters:
      coordinateField - A field of a coordinate (eg: x or y)
      distanceMax - the max distance, see DISTANCE_MAX_HEIGHT a,d DISTANCE_MAX_WIDTH
      coordinatesField - A list of coordinates field (e.g.: a list of abscissa if the coordinate field is an ordinate).
      Returns:
      false if the given coordinate exceed the maximum distance between itself and one of the coordinate.
